Name: Volcano Cycle: Lesson for Kids
Subject: ['renewable energy', 'earthquakes', 'science', 'seismology', 'energy', 'volcanic eruptions', 'business and industrial', 'volcanology', 'geology', 'geothermal energy']
Description: Like many things in nature, volcanoes go through cycles. A volcanic cycle is unique because it can take thousands of years to complete. Here, you will learn about the three stages of a volcano's life cycle.
